meanings.definition: A device that measures the distance traveled by a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: My new cyclometer showed that I rode five miles today.
meanings.sent2: The cyclometer on my bike helps me keep track of how far I've cycled.
meanings.sent3: When my cyclometer beeped, I realized I had biked the distance of a marathon!
meanings.sent4: The cyclometer is like a little detective, always knowing how far I've traveled.
meanings.sent5: The cyclometer's display lit up, revealing the exact distance I had pedaled.

meanings.definition: To measure the distance traveled by a bicycle using a cyclometer.
meanings.sent1: I cyclometered my ride yesterday and found out I covered ten miles.
meanings.sent2: Remember to cyclometer your cycling route to see how far you go.
meanings.sent3: I cyclometered my way through the park, feeling like a biking scientist.
meanings.sent4: She cyclometers her bike trips with precision, never missing a mile.
meanings.sent5: Cyclometering the distance on my bike ride made me appreciate the journey more.
